body:
resolves #36336

#### PR description:

Follow up on #35489, based on suggestion at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36336#issuecomment-1017505414.
   * 527187e5b333a2ba15892a2a6db5672ab2c72514 :  Change to `SiStripCluster` DF, use `auto` for return types;

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles.
title: Change to `SiStripCluster` DataFormat: use `auto` for return types
